examples.title: transparencyInfo

description: The transparencyInfo visual variable defines the transparency, or opacity, of each feature's symbol based on a numeric attribute field value.
title: TransparencyInfo Visual Variable

$eref.description: Options available for the legend for visual variables.
$eref.title: Visual Variable Legend Options

___showLegend.description: Indicates whether to show the color/size/opacity ramp in the legend.

___field.description: Attribute field used for setting the transparency of a feature if no `valueExpression` is provided.

$eref.description: The transparencyStop object defines the thematic opacity ramp in a sequence of stops. At least two stops are required. The stops must be listed in ascending order based on the value of the `value` property in each stop.
$eref.title: transparencyStop

___value.description: The pixel intensity value. Describes the pixel intensity value that the color should be associated with.

___label.description: A string value used to label the stop in the legend.

___transparency.description: A numeric transparancy value for a stop ranging from 0-100, where 0 is opaque and 100 is 100% transparent.

___type.description: Specifies the type of visual variable.

___valueExpressionTitle.description: The title identifying and describing the associated [Arcade](https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/) expression as defined in the `valueExpression` property.

___normalizationField.description: Attribute field used to normalize the data.
